div.div: GWT IP Address To Decimal Calculator

The URL for Google company is http://www.google.com. An nslookup of the URL reveals one of its IP address: http://74.125.224.72 (which is the real address used to find the Website).
IP addresses are expressed in dotted-decimal format - basically 4 sets of numbers from 0 to 255 separated by periods. Either http://74.125.224.72 or http://www.google.com will take you to the same place.
Another way to get there is by using the decimal equivalent of its dotted-decimal address: http://1249763400.
Try out the calculator by entering 74.125.224.72 (with the periods).in the textbox below and click Convert.
